attributes.action: Cut university students tuition fees amid the coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: With the UK now in an economic crisis, students are going to be graduating into an environment full of unpredictability. Help support students who are the upcoming workforce as they will be a critical part of the economic recovery for this country.
attributes.background: With the majority of UK universities now moving online due to the coronavirus, we are losing valuable face-to-face teaching and support. We urge parliament to consider cutting our tuition costs whilst our lectures and seminars are cancelled.
